page.title: 18EAST LANCASHIRE ROAD
page.content: {THE EAST LANCASHIRE ROAD}(A580) KNOWN AS THE{'EAST LANCS'}OR THE{'NEW ROAD' IS A{DUAL CARRIAGEWAY}LINKING {LIVERPOOL}AND{MANCHESTER.}IT IS A VERY BUSY ROAD CARRYING HEAVY TRANSPORT, SUCH AS{ARTICULATED LORRIES,}OFTEN TOO LARGE FOR NORMAL ROADS. THERE ARE FEW HOUSES FACING THE EAST LANCS AS THE ROAD WOULD PROVE TO BE A{HAZARD}TO YOUNG CHILDREN AND IT IS A RATHER {NOISY}PLACE TO LIVE. IT IS PROBABLY TIME THAT AN EXTRA LANE WAS BUILT TO HELP THE SMOOTH FLOW OF SUCH A VOLUME OF TRAFFIC. IN PLACES ON THE NORTH AND SOUTH SIDES OF THE CARRIAGEWAY THERE ARE GRASS VERGES, HEDGES AND{CYCLING PATHS}OR {FOOTPATHS.}NEW IMPROVED CYCLE PATHS ARE BEING CONSTUCTED WEST OF OUR AREA. THERE IS A{NEW SEATING AREA}AT THE JUNCTION OF THIS ROAD AND{HIGHER GREEN {LANE. }
